topic.title: To reach the general public: Browser addon to browse on the ZeroNet
topic.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
It is not encouraging for the general public to install all the packages in order to explore the ZeroNet.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Aiming to let users to browse the ZeroNet with traditional browsers seamlessly, it should be a good idea to add a Chrome / Firefox plugin for ZeroNet

1604067776_mirrored_friday-james_github.body: Thanks for your explanation. I guess I'll simply close this issue. Hope that ZeroNet will become popular in the near future. ;)
